title: Peds Cardiology Handbook 4+
subtitle: Pediatric cardiology
appDescription: Thanks for checking out this app! My name is Ellis Rochelson — I'm a pediatric cardiologist, electrophysiologist, and novice programmer. This is a pocket reference guide for those taking care of children with congenital or acquired heart disease. The goal is to offer quick answers to questions we face in our daily practice. I would love to hear any feedback regarding the content or programming of this app — please email me at rochelson.ellis@gmail.com with any suggestions you may have. [Disclaimer: This app should never replace medical judgment.] more

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.review: Great app, very informative, easy to navigate. Thank you

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.review: Concise. Clear. Easy to navigate. Easy to read (bullet style hierarchy writing style). Bravo!

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.review: Excellent resource for trainees and practicing cardiologists! User friendly, extensive, and sources cited.
